title: Clash Team Needed
body:
Hi guys,

I am currently looking for teams/clans/groups to join for both ranked and clash matches.
I can play all roles (except ADC) well, preferences would be jg>mid>top>sup and have many options for all roles.
I have hovered between gold and silver but never had a consistent team to learn and improve with and very eager to start that now.
If interested add me in game and good luck in clash.

Sir 4TL4S
